title: Clorofila
typeOfFood: Vegan, Organic, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Bakery, Caribbean
description: This restaurant became all-vegan Mar 2016. Offers a variety of dishes and has breakfast quesadillas and enchiladas, German bread, locally grown fruit and vegetables, coffee, and cold pressed juice. Uses vegan cheese and milk, herbs, lettuce, sprouts.
streetAddress: Calle 20 Esq Av 30 norte 222, Colonia Gonzalo Guerrero
